verbose_text: In addition, treatment with visfatin in vitro has been shown to promote the proliferation of vascular smooth muscle cells and to increase the endothelial expression of vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 (VCAM-1), intercellular adhesion molecule-1 (ICAM-1) and E-selectin, all of which are considered as biomarkers of endothelial dysfunction.
evidence: promote the proliferation of vascular smooth muscle cells               and to increase the endothelial expression of vascular cell adhesion molecule-1
